about_the_game:
Aru, Nate, and Tator are whisked away to a dimension of nightmares where they meet the Scream Screen and the Concierge. Enter the Nightmare Arena and battle through over 40 challenging battles with stronger, twisted nightmare versions of enemies you've encountered. There may even be a familiar face at the end as an incredibly difficult superboss!

Get awesome prizes including new summon skills that deal damage to all enemies. You can use these items and skills in the normal world as well!

Battles have a limited amount of XP you can spend so you can't just grind your way to the top. Guess it's time to get good!

Along with this DLC there will be a free update to the base game that includes a huge new feature...A STICKER COLLECTION! You can collect stickers from enemies, view them, and place them on pages in a sticker book.

You don't have to have the DLC to obtain and use stickers, but you can only get stickers of the nightmare enemies in the DLC.

Coming out October 25, 2022!
(Requires Video Game Fables base game to play.)

INSTRUCTIONS TO ACCESS DLC CONTENT AFTER PURCHASING

  • Once you have purchased the DLC, restart the game.
  • On the main menu of the game, on the right side, there will be a sign for the DLC. If the DLC has properly been detected there will be a text box above that sign that says "DLC ACTIVATED!".
  • If you purchased the DLC and still do not have that "DLC ACTIVATED!" indicator, close the game, exit Steam, and restart Steam.
  • Any time after you have finished the first dungeon in the game, speak to the innkeeper in Castleton. If the DLC is detected a cutscene will begin, introducing you to the DLC.
